description.en:
Parts & Accessories Car inspection services

Car inspection before purchasing in Jeddah at a specialized inspection center with an official report.
Services:
1 - Comprehensive mechanical and computer inspection of the car.
2 - High-resolution photography of all car observations with complete clarity.
3 - Ownership transfer, insurance, and shipping of the car to any city in the Kingdom.
4 - All photos in the advertisement are personal images of cars that I have processed and shipped to clients.
5 - Communication can be via WhatsApp or a call at the following number:
0547951614. After you agree with the car owner, send me their number and I will take care of the matter, God willing.
6 - It is preferable to send your request via WhatsApp.
**************************************
((By the grace of God, I have experience with all car types and pay attention to the smallest details, and I have over 3000 followers and high ratings, thanks to God.))
**************************************
We can represent you in a complete car inspection without your presence or with your presence in Jeddah:
- Inspection of the engine, transmission, and differential.
- Inspection of the braking and suspension systems.
- Inspection of the body, scratches, and chassis.
- Inspection of the interior and decorations.
- Inspection of all oils.
- Comprehensive mechanical inspection.
- Computer inspection of all sensors.
- Inspection of tires and safety tools.
- Road test.
- Check for accident damage.
- Photography of the car and observations.
â•â•â•â•â•â• â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•
Contact me via WhatsApp to send the location of the car inspection center.
0547951614
0547951614
0547951614
It is preferable to save my number due to daily updates of the advertisement.
(Press the follow button for the account to see all exclusive offers.)

Gender: Male  
Age: 1 year and 5 months  
Date of Birth: 25/9/2023  
City: Riyadh  
Type: Domestic Cat  

Health: Healthy, no health issues, accustomed to the litter box, dry food, and is gentle and friendly. He loves to play and enjoys being petted. He is sociable and used to being around other cats.

Reason for sale: Due to many commitments and the inability to bear the costs.  
Price: 650 SAR
